architectureStyle.description: Criminal enterprise aesthetic - pleasure palaces, hidden vaults, and pirate havens
keyElements: Green-skinned culture reflected in green and gold coloring
Decadent pleasure palace aesthetic for entertainment
Hidden rooms and escape routes for criminal operations
Syndicate headquarters style with concealed defenses
Mixed architectural styles from stolen goods
Slave market historical elements now repurposed
